summary: This document appears to be a daily assignment log for a staff member named 'Davis, MS' at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, NY, covering dates from July 22, 2019, to August 17, 2019. It details shift assignments, days off, sick leave, and overtime, primarily to the Special Housing Unit (SHU #3). The log date of August 12, 2019, is significant as it falls within the period of Jeffrey Epstein's incarceration at MCC prior to his death.

keyFacts: This is a staff assignment log for the third quarter of 2019 at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York.
The primary assignment for the staff member 'Davis, MS' was to 'SHU #3' on the P/M (likely Post/Mid or similar) shift, designation '10'.
The log shows patterns of work, days off, and leave (including sick leave on August 3, 2019) for a correctional officer during the period Jeffrey Epstein was held at MCC.
The document includes overtime entries, specifically for 'RET TRAVEL' and 'LANS 2' assignments, indicating additional duties beyond the standard SHU post.
The document's date (August 12, 2019) and the covered period (July-August 2019) are temporally proximate to Jeffrey Epstein's death in custody on August 10, 2019.
